title: Shield of Faith
content:
Shield of Faith Level 1 Abjuration Spell Protect a creature from attacks: increase its Armour Class by 2. Until Long Rest 18m Concentration Bonus Action Level 1 Spell Slot

Level 1 Abjuration Spell

Protect a creature from attacks: increase its Armour Class by 2.

18m Concentration

Shield of Faith is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Shield of Faith is a Lvl 1 Spell from the Abjuration school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Shield of Faith Information in BG3

Description: Protect a creature from attacks: increase its Armour Class by 2. Level: Lvl 1 Spell School: Abjuration Casting Time: Bonus Action Range: 18m/60ft Requires Concentration: Yes Saving Throw: None Additional Details: None

Shield of Faith (Condition)

Duration: Remains until fully rested (This Condition ends early if Concentration is broken). Receives a +2 bonus to Armour Class.

How to Acquire Shield of Faith in Baldur's Gate 3

Shield of Faith can be acquired by the following classes: Cleric, Paladin War Domain (Domain Spell) Shield of Faith can be cast by using the following items and feats: Magic Initiate: Cleric Sword of Justice (as Tyr's Protection) Dark Justiciar Half-Plate (as Shar's Aegis)

Cleric, Paladin War Domain (Domain Spell)

Magic Initiate: Cleric Sword of Justice (as Tyr's Protection) Dark Justiciar Half-Plate (as Shar's Aegis)

Shield of Faith Tips & Notes in BG3

Upcast: Grants no additional benefit when cast as higher level spell. Bonuses to AC generally stack unless they state otherwise. Differences from D&D 5th Edition: In 5E, shield of faith only lasts up to 10 minutes (100 Turns).
